title: Chinese university completes space-based solar power ground test facility
summary: China's Xidian University has completed what it calls the world’s first full-link and full-system ground test system for space-based solar power.

title: BlueHalo wins $11 million Air Force contract for laser communications terminals
summary: BlueHalo won an $11 million contract from AFRL to develop a pair of optical laser communications terminals and a ground station.

title: Air Force scientist takes over as director of Space Force rapid procurement agency
summary: Former AFRL directed energy director Kelly Hammett on June 6, 2022, took over as head of the Space Rapid Capabilities Office

title: SpaceX a big step closer to orbital Starship launches after passing FAA environmental review
summary: SpaceX has secured environmental approval from the FAA and relevant federal, state, and local stakeholders to conduct orbital Starship launches on the...

title: Atlas wins Defense Innovation Unit Award for hybrid network
summary: Atlas Space Operations announced a Defense Innovation Unit contract June 8 to demonstrate a hybrid network to link Defense Department, civil government and commercial satellites.
